00032 #include <stdio.h>
00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 
00036 #include "blf_internal.h"
00037 
00038 #include "BLI_string_utf8.h"
00039 
00040 unsigned int blf_next_p2(unsigned int x)
00041 {
00042     x -= 1;
00043     x |= (x >> 16);
00044     x |= (x >> 8);
00045     x |= (x >> 4);
00046     x |= (x >> 2);
00047     x |= (x >> 1);
00048     x += 1;
00049     return x;
00050 }
00051 
00052 unsigned int blf_hash(unsigned int val)
00053 {
00054     unsigned int key;
00055 
00056     key = val;
00057     key += ~(key << 16);
00058     key ^= (key >> 5);
00059     key += (key << 3);
00060     key ^= (key >> 13);
00061     key += ~(key << 9);
00062     key ^= (key >> 17);
00063     return key % 257;
00064 }
